title: Source Config
description: Configuration for token source files. Designers can add new paths without editing build.js.

basePath.description: Base path for token files (relative to project root)

light.description: Source files for light theme build (paths relative to basePath)

dark.description: Source files for dark theme build (paths relative to basePath)

designerImportsFolder.description: Folder name under basePath. Any *.json files here are auto-included in both light and dark builds.
